artist: Artist: Utagawa Kuniyoshi; Publisher: Ebiya Rinnosuke
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: center and left sheets of a vertical ōban triptych
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 5/8 in. (36.5 × 24.5 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban) each sheet
markings: on each sheet: red artist\'s kiri seal; unknown publisher\'s seal; censor: 福 {Fuku}, 村松 {Muramatsu}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: on each sheet: 一勇斎国芳画 {Ichiyūsai Kuniyoshi ga}
text: Center and left sheets of a vertical ōban triptych related to the play Omegumi ni uruo Iwafuji 恵閏初夏藤, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 4th month of 1849
title: Actors Fujikawa Hanatomo III as Onoe [right], Nakayama Bungorō II as Nakayama [center], and Bandō Shuka I as Ochiyo, Iwafuji's Servant [left]
